name: Interagency
description:
Work as an agent of The Multiverse Agency and defend the fabric of realities themselves! Use your somewhat-standard-issue pistol to take out a powerful portal eater and its spawn. Chase your target through multiple universes with the assistance of your trusty dispatch and the other agency departments who will twist reality in your favour.

This prototype game was made over four weeks as part of an assignment to make a first-person shooter game for Dawson College's Independent Video Game Design program.

Feedback

We'd love to receive your feedback! Please follow this feedback survey link.

Install Instructions

1. Download the windows or mac build.
2. Locate the .zip you've downloaded and extract it.
3. Inside of the "Interagency" folder, double-click the Interagency.exe, enjoy!
4. If you get a "Windows Protected your PC" screen, click "More Info", and then click "Run Anyway".

Controls

The controls are also available in game!

Keyboard + Mouse

UI  
WASD: Navigate menus Enter: Confirm selection

In-Game
WASD: Move Character / Move Menu
Enter: Select Menu option
Mouse: Move Camera
Left Click: Shoot
Right Click: Aim down sights
R: Reload
F: Check Mod
Mouse Wheel: Change Equipped Mod
Space: Jump
Escape: Pause Menu
